website_summaries.verdict: Affordable, chic, and versatile, this is a stylish wardrobe staple for many.
pros: Unique "batwing" design with handkerchief hem is loose-fitting and fun
cons: Some owners say it runs larger than expected

customer_reviews.title: Very elegant and classy top.
customer_reviews.text: I wore this for an event where I'd be around extremely rich and judgmental people. I didnt stick out like the normal sore thumb that I usually do (especially since I'm an unwed single mom and apparently old people still look down on that). In fact, I actually got compliments on how good. I'm always on the hunt for inexpensive fashion that look expensive. So if this review helped you, the please push the helpful button so I can know I did good. You can also look or follow my page on Amazon where I'm always reviewing steals like this.
customer_reviews.author: Remedy do da

customer_reviews.title: Great Winter Sweater
customer_reviews.text: I wore this to thanksgiving dinner and received several compliments. It’s a cute sweater and it keeps you warm. I can see myself wearing this several times this winter.
customer_reviews.author: tpenny239

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: I love this top! I bought the blue and really like the color. The turtleneck is a little looser than normal, but I like it. I’m happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: Steinmetz OG4

customer_reviews.title: Watch sizes
customer_reviews.text: It was hard to choose whether to pick too small or too large. The sleeves are too tight but the body of the shirt is too big. Weird combination. Did not like the batwing sleeve either. Make sure you do not have larger arms or it will be uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: Did Not Meet Expectations
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a gift, and was pleased with both the color and the softness of material, however the lack of quality in cut was apparent as the triangular hem was completely off-center—not matching up to the description and photo. They may not all be wonky, but we ended up with one that seems to have been thrown together, so I’m not giving it more than 3 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Rebekah

customer_reviews.title: ... this just looks a little strange BUT it is super comfortable, love that the fabric is soft and ...
customer_reviews.text: Something about the fit of this just looks a little strange BUT it is super comfortable, love that the fabric is soft and nice (substantial without being to thick and heavy). Looks cute with jeans and booties. Definitely a keeper and easy to wear. Very flattering if a little odd.
customer_reviews.author: A. D.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and good quality!
customer_reviews.text: I am 5’7” and 27 weeks pregnant in the photos. I’m about 150 lbs here. I originally ordered the medium, and I returned it for the large. The medium actually fit perfect, but I was worried about shrinkage since it is 50% cotton. I am wearing the large here and I love it. I machine washed cold, and even though the tag says to hang dry, I dried it partway, and then hung. I would say it did shrink a bit but I expected that. It is a very comfortable top and I would love to order another color. Quality seems good. I am a fan of shirts with cotton blends so I was glad to find this.
customer_reviews.author: ams5174

customer_reviews.title: This is a totally different from the photo. Definitely ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a totally different from the photo. Definitely not tunic style and for sure is NOT a turtleneck. Returning now.
customer_reviews.author: Nina Mata

customer_reviews.title: Great weight to the material
customer_reviews.text: So I am 5'6", 180 lbs. Putting me at a solid 14-16 in most clothes. This fit exactly as I had hoped. Just enough swing to be flowy without making me look even bigger than I am, Great weight to the material, I was actually quite surprised by how solid, but very soft the material is. It had a pretty obnoxious chemical smell right out of the bag, but one wash and it went away completely. So cute that I am thinking about getting other colors now. Can't go wrong for this price.
customer_reviews.author: Scubagirl

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and Fashionable
customer_reviews.text: The hemline on this turtleneck takes it out of the ordinary. It's very comfortable. The bat wing sleeves leave extra room, but they're not so wide as to look odd. I wear my turtlenecks up, not folded over. This one stands up pretty well on its own. Higher than a mock neck, which would cut off my neck in a bad place. My only complaint might be that it's a little long at the far bottom for someone who is just 5' tall. Other than that, it's just the perfect casual top!
customer_reviews.author: Gail from Lake Geneva

customer_reviews.title: It runs big loose fit
customer_reviews.text: I would down size it runs big it’s a loose top so that’s why I would recommend this it’s a nice top
customer_reviews.author: maryann  astuto

customer_reviews.title: This top is very comfortable. It is not flattering though
customer_reviews.text: This top is very comfortable. It is not flattering though. I feel like I am expecting or smuggling something illegally 😅
customer_reviews.author: NatsFan

customer_reviews.title: Sometimes you wanna be a fashion sock; this is for those times
customer_reviews.text: 'How do I pull off extreme comfort, vague artsiness, and hiding my Zoidberg-like body all in one go?' I thought to myself. Little did I know, the holy grail shirt existed; for the low, low cost of a little bit of dignity and $19.99, it was mine.
customer_reviews.author: forest fox

customer_reviews.title: A nice way to wear a t-neck
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this tunic top in size medium. The tunic is a nice comfortable loose fit in the body, sleeves and neck, and I love the handkerchief hem. I am 5’, 130 lbs and 34D, and depending on the style, I usually wear a size medium (8-10) or large. This top was meant to be a loose fit, so I can say this top is true to size. Look forward to wearing this top.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley

customer_reviews.title: This is HUGE!
customer_reviews.text: THIS WAS HUGE! I ordered an XL because the description said that was a SIZE 8 in USA so, I assumed it was made in China where everything runs VERY SMALL. I kept it because of the price, and now I just sleep in it. LIKE A NIGHT GOWN! LOL. I am assuming I would give it a 4-5 stars if it fit, it seems nice, but is hard to tell with it so gigantic on me.
customer_reviews.author: Kimbra

customer_reviews.title: Skip this one
customer_reviews.text: I read all the reviews and looked at the size chart. Still huge. I normally wear a M-L depending on the shirt and this thing was gigantic. I could have easily gotten and XS. I'm 5'4" and about 150 pounds. I literally look like I'm wearing a tent. Not flattering at all,.
customer_reviews.author: J. N.

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected!!
customer_reviews.text: This shirt is so comfortable! I was skeptical at first after ready some reviews but it fit perfect. I feel it fits true to size and definitely maintains a loose flowy fit (which I like and feel is the purpose of this shirt). The arms weren’t too tight and the bat wings weren’t too exaggerated. Definitely recommend this shirt!
customer_reviews.author: K. Marie

customer_reviews.title: True to size, flowy
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect navy/purple tone turtleneck. The assymetrical hem line was the clincher for me - made it look more flowy than heavy if it would have a straight hem across the thigh. Fabric is light and soft, and the neckline isn't a tight turtleneck, its a tad looser so you can pull forward for a slight cowl neck. I have received a lot of compliments - always proud to say, 'Amazon, 25 bucks' :)
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Size! Does not run small. Very true to size.
customer_reviews.text: I assumed this ran small so I ordered a large. Nope..large is large. It says do not tumble dry but I washed it and dried it for about 15 mins then hung it up. I absolutely love it!! I will be ordering other colors too but the time in the correct size! Worth the price which was not that expensive. Good quality! Two thumbs up for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful casual top
customer_reviews.text: Just what I wanted and expected. I usually wear a size large, ordered large, I'm 5' 4, C cup and it fits wonderfully. Just enough crotch and butt coverage to wear with leggings. Received two compliments the first day I wore it. I really like the drop sleeve, so I don't worry about sweating too much in the armpits. The mock turtle neck collar isn't bad, actually flattering with a long necklace. Will buy in other colors.
customer_reviews.author: Lacey's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Loving it
customer_reviews.text: Fits as expected, I always get compliments when I wear it. I love it a lot and it's so comfortable! The only thing I wasn't expecting is the asymmetry, the long tips aren't centered but it looks cool that way anyway it was just a moment of confusion on 1st wear.
customer_reviews.author: Yesenia

customer_reviews.title: Comfy, cozy, and versatile!
customer_reviews.text: I am 5'10" and typically wear L/XL. Initially I purchased this in Wine (XL) and have since ordered it in gray, too. It's a little stiff when you first get it, but just wash and dry the top and it will be perfectly cozy and soft. I live in the midwest and find that this is the perfect thing to wear in the winter - looks like a sweater but is comfy like a sweatshirt. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: This top looks different than the picture. It fits really large and the color looks faded. Doesn’t look like the picture at all. Don’t know what I am going to do with it so please think twice before making this purchase. DO NOT waste your money...
customer_reviews.author: Keke

customer_reviews.title: Casual everyday top.
customer_reviews.text: The fabric is a thick t-shirt type material, casual looking. I’m 5’8” 150 lbs and purchased a medium. The fit is as expected, but the sleeves are tight around the biceps area. My arms average not too skinny or particularly big. This is not a common issue I have with shirts. I’m hoping they won’t shrink once it is washed.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute and classy
customer_reviews.text: The material is like a thick t-shirt fabric. Sleeves fit snug on my slim arms. Pairs well with skinny jeans. I have a long torso, so I wear a cami under it to make sure my skin stays covered on the sides of the shirt. I have a very narrow chest and a post-3-baby 'mummy tummy,' and I feel like this top is flattering and forgiving.
customer_reviews.author: Brianna

customer_reviews.title: Not what I ordered! No shark bite hem at all!!
customer_reviews.text: This is not what is pictured or what I should have received! Disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: AvidAmazonShopper

customer_reviews.title: Can't expect too much for this price
customer_reviews.text: These pictures are typically deceiving ..... received the sweater and it did not look like the picture. Surprise! The fit was much looser than described and the entire sweater was irregularly shaped and the front and back "downward triangles" were misaligned. Get what you pay for with this one ..... can't expect too much ......
customer_reviews.author: Song

customer_reviews.title: I really like this top
customer_reviews.text: I really like this top..I ordered a large even though I normally wear a medium.it's a little roomy but I like it...I will probably get a medium with another color..but it's very soft and pretty
customer_reviews.author: jettye tisinger

customer_reviews.title: huge disappointment
customer_reviews.text: Stiff and rather thin fabric, very large through the body but uncomfortably tight in the arms. Good example of the adage "you get what you pay for." Also not as long as it appears in the photo - and I'm only 5' 4" tall.
customer_reviews.author: SetterLovr

customer_reviews.title: More sweatshirt feel than sweater - but I love it and get lots of compliments!
customer_reviews.text: I get a lot of compliments every time I wear this shirt. I bought the gray. I thought it would be more sweater material, it's more of a sweatshirt, but comfy and attractive nonetheless. I can dress it up with black pants and a long pendant necklace or dress it down with jeans. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: E.T.

customer_reviews.title: Fun style
customer_reviews.text: I really like this top! Flowing, long and angular with yoga pants. Sleeves are fitted. A fun basic style to wear everyday and still look fashionable...I went back and ordered two more colors. Washed in cold water, hung to dry then fluffed in no heat setting in dryer....ready to go.
customer_reviews.author: Up north girl

customer_reviews.title: The material feels more like a heavier jersey
customer_reviews.text: The material feels more like a heavier jersey. It has a nice hand to it. The fit was good on it. I bought it big and it fits as I expected it to. Overall I'm happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Katie M.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable but faded
customer_reviews.text: The color (black) faded quite a bit after a couple of washes, but I do like the style and cut. It works well with leggings and ankle boots. The fit is intended to be loose and comfortable. Does not bind around the neck or chest. Arms fit closely though so it doesn't look like a sack. I'd try a different color if I were to buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: meh
customer_reviews.text: I'm returning this. I thought it would be kind of light and flowy, but it's thicker than I'd imagined and stiffer. So maybe it's because I'm a bit busty (36C, 5'2", 140lbs), just wasn't very flattering on me. I got the Medium, and it was the right size, just didn't love it.
customer_reviews.author: Susan S.

customer_reviews.title: Size large
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Tight in my arms but love how it looks and will probably order another color. I wear size 12 an ordered large in grey.
customer_reviews.author: DNB SOTO

customer_reviews.title: Cute and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Soft, comfortable and look good with casual pants or dressed up. I wanted this shirt to hide the tummy and wear over nursing camis which it does well but unfortunately it arrived with a small hole in the back. I wasn’t able to exchange it but I was able to return it for a rerun without any hassle
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Nice top
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice top and nice material. I do wish it was a little longer other than the places that are angled. Barely covers my bottom but it does work for me. Size is true I wear a large and it fits well. Nice fabric. Just wish it had a little more overall length.
customer_reviews.author: rlr1960

customer_reviews.title: Let down
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed with the color and fabric. It’s made from a tee-shirt material. The color is like a dingy gray. I was hoping to pair it with black skinnies for teaching, but I don’t think it looks professional. To be honest, I didn’t even try it on. I’m returning.
customer_reviews.author: Hillarie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect throw on and go shirt
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this shirt in a M as I didn't want it to be too big. I normally wear a L top. The triangle pieces that hang down are definitely not centered but I noticed this with other people's review photos so I guess its normally. The turtleneck is nice because it doesn't feel suffocating. Planning to wear this to Thanksgiving dinner.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Cuttone

customer_reviews.title: Just right
customer_reviews.text: I loved the comfortable fit and length of this tunic. I bought it to wear under an angel costume that was short sleeved. The only thing I wish was different about it, is that it can't be put in dryer. I plan to wear it alot. It's so versatile and just right.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: She likes it!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my brother's girlfriend and she said she loves it. They are long distance so I can't tell if she's lying and never wears it (LOL), but it's super cute!
customer_reviews.author: J P

customer_reviews.title: WAYYY too big
customer_reviews.text: It was comical how big this thing was...it fit in the arms and chest, but then at the bottom....wow! I am 5’3” so I expected it to be slightly long, but it came down below my knees, the longer parts were mid calf on me!
customer_reviews.author: Katelyn

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: GReat Price got here fast and looks great with skinny jeans and leggins.You gotta love this!
customer_reviews.author: dianejmac

customer_reviews.title: Gave it another look
customer_reviews.text: I thought the top was really cute on the model. I ordered it. When it arrived, I didn’t like it at all. I gave it another look, and tried it on. It was really cute. Not a true turtleneck, though. It is a mock turtleneck, which I’m glad. Very comfortable. Will wear it on cool days.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Bishop

customer_reviews.title: Comfy!
customer_reviews.text: Adorable casual (thicker) t-shirt material. The neck is not tight at all... which was a big concern. It fits very loosely around the neck.
customer_reviews.author: Sunnidaze

customer_reviews.title: Cute sweater!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this sweater!!! I’m 5’7 and about 150 and I like my sweaters to be loose. I ordered a large and it’s awesome!! The only thing I would watch out for is that the sides are a little shorter so when I raise my hands you’re able to see my sides. Other than that. It’s a great sweater. Nice material and super comfy.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Battista

customer_reviews.title: Good As A Knock-Around Top
customer_reviews.text: This top is as described. True to size. Non-remarkable material. Unfortunately, it makes me look like a linebacker. Not special enough for a night out with friends. Best for a Saturday running errands. Will not purchase in additional colors, as originally planned.
customer_reviews.author: GiantsGirl

customer_reviews.title: Great with Leggings
customer_reviews.text: Overall, happy with the purchase. However, the neck was a little wider than I expected, and the material isn't at all stretchy. For some reason, I was thinking the whole piece would be a stretchy, almost jersey-like material. But it was a good find for the price, and I'll definitely wear it again (assuming it will hold-up in the wash...).
customer_reviews.author: Kally Kruchten

customer_reviews.title: Not as pictured
customer_reviews.text: Cloth is thicker than expected and the turtleneck is stiff and tight, I was thinking it would be closer to a cowl neck style. Not horrible overall, just not what I was looking for. Fabric does not hang the way it does in the pictures.
customer_reviews.author: J. Malan

customer_reviews.title: Not as expected
customer_reviews.text: Shirt is oversized. I ordered a size up to make it oversized so with it already oversized, it made it 2 sizes too big which is not flattering. Fuzz and hair sticks to it very easily so wearing under a sweater/sweater cardigan is a terrible idea if you take the sweater off.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Order a size down...maybe two
customer_reviews.text: it's a cute top however, i normally wear an XL but this is incredibly too big and looks like a tent on....definitely being returned....the material is on the thicker side and it was comfy just entirely way too big
customer_reviews.author: Karrie

customer_reviews.title: Ugh!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love this top! It was good until I washed it. It got super wonky in the neck and shoulders, super short on one side. Haven’t been able to wear it since!
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Did not fit as expected
customer_reviews.text: I returned this tunic. It did not fit well at all and didn't look good. It was uncomfortable around the arms. It just wasn't what I was expecting so I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: into a cave

customer_reviews.title: For taller ladies
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice shirt. I'm 5'4 100lb. I look like a ghost in this shirt. Maybe a belt around the waist n boots would look nicely but I wear it around the house, keeps me warm.
customer_reviews.author: Vee

customer_reviews.title: Not a quality product
customer_reviews.text: The color was great but the material was “off” and puckered around the hemline. Almost looked old and worn like it has been washed too many times. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: SouthernMissy

customer_reviews.title: Looks great; arms little tight.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased in a medium as I have an athletic build with large(r) arms, and it is still a little tight in the arms. However, the material is somewhat giving, so I will keep it. It's really nice with leggings and boots for fall!
customer_reviews.author: curiousCassie

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this top. It’s def not a sweater but it’s a heavier weight jersey material that feels very soft and nicely made. I may get some more colors.
customer_reviews.author: Beach Girl

customer_reviews.title: Not for women with large upper arms!
customer_reviews.text: It fits and is TTS, hangs loose but those arms are ridiculously tight in the upper portion. So if you’ve got some meat on your arms, I’d steer clear.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly & Rene (But mostly Kelly)

customer_reviews.title: Like a T-shirt
customer_reviews.text: I expected a sweater type material this was more like the material of a heavier T-shirt.
customer_reviews.author: Randy P.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit! I bought a x
customer_reviews.text: I got this top and was so pleased with the fit. I have thrown it in the washer and dryer several times. I love it so much I have ordered 2 more and am looking for a 3rd and 4th. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: GalinRedShoes

customer_reviews.title: HUGE!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a medium and it was more like a xl or xxl. VERY big. Had to return.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: Horrible! Don’t waste your money. Looks nothing like the picture
customer_reviews.author: Jena

customer_reviews.title: Not great
customer_reviews.text: Fits narrow at the shoulders/arms and chest. Sent back because it was too tight and material was not super cozy/probably wouldn’t have held up that long
customer_reviews.author: mvplatt

customer_reviews.title: levaca Women's Long Batwing Sleeve Turtleneck Hankerchief Hem Loose Casual Tunic
customer_reviews.text: Due to packaging, It was incredibly wrinkled when I received it. After trying it on, the fabric did not lay smooth as shown in the picture due to the severe wrinkles. The arms were a bit tight and I don't have big arms.
customer_reviews.author: Alesia

customer_reviews.title: Don’t like how it looks
customer_reviews.text: It does not look like it does on the model. It fit as expected. However, it hangs completely different than it does in the picture. It just looked horrible when I put it on. I am returning it
customer_reviews.author: Tami Schaumburg

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this top. Bought as a nursing friendly top that I would also want to wear after. Lightweight, but warm. It is starting to look worn after a year of heavy use so I’m thinking of purchasing another because I love it so much.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: This is great! I love loose/flowy clothes and this was warm without being constrictive. I got a lot of compliments on it. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Michou

customer_reviews.title: I returned it.
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the material is so cheap. The collar doesn't fit (no standing, no laying) I can't even imagine what would happen to this shirt after first laundry.
customer_reviews.author: Olga

customer_reviews.title: Too baggy, I returned.
customer_reviews.text: Just not a flattering fit for me but I’m round in the middle. Might look great on someone else but it just wasn’t my style. It was so baggy I just looked like a giant beet.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonMom

customer_reviews.title: Nice shirts, but far too much of a magnet ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice shirts, but far too much of a magnet for animal hairs (I have 3 dogs and 3 cats) ...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: comfortable top
customer_reviews.text: I liked the top. Its very comfortable top and warm for cold winter days. It goes with everything. Looks great with leggings. It fits larger than expected I would go down a size.
customer_reviews.author: jayme peddycoart

customer_reviews.title: Don’t like the look of it, but it’s comfortable around the house
customer_reviews.text: It fits, but isn’t as fashionable as the picture shows. It’s very angular in the front and back, not really as displayed. I will say it’s comfortable, and nice to wear when it’s cold or lounging around the house.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Way to large
customer_reviews.text: I ordered an XL as the last XL levaca shirt I ordered fit perfectly - I think 2 people could comfortably fit in this one.
customer_reviews.author: paperlady

customer_reviews.title: Perfect! I was expecting to return this and when ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! I was expecting to return this and when I put it on I was excited. It's flattering- I am an XL/14-16 and it was slimming.
customer_reviews.author: Elisa M Wisz

customer_reviews.title: New favorite
customer_reviews.text: Love this sweater! My weight fluctuates between 174-177.8 and I love that it flowy and it doesn’t show my belly. I purchased a large and it doesn’t look big on me. Definitely a new favorite.
customer_reviews.author: LovelyMzLila

customer_reviews.title: So-so
customer_reviews.text: Overall I like this top but some things I did not. First, the handkerchief cut was not right..the point was not in middle..slightly off which looked a little funny. The material is heavy which made me hot and uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: michelleD

customer_reviews.title: interesting artsy shape
customer_reviews.text: It's not quite long enough to be a tunic, but it's a very cool top with a modern look. The fabric seems good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon customer

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised!!
customer_reviews.text: Cute top! Looks great with jeggings and some boots! I am 5’2 140 lbs and a 30H the medium fits perfectly, perfect length and really comfortable fit all around.
customer_reviews.author: LJTaylor

customer_reviews.title: Wanted to love this shirt
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to love this shirt. Tight at the arm even though its listed as a batwing. Just didn't fit well, returned.
customer_reviews.author: dlee

customer_reviews.title: Nope!
customer_reviews.text: Way too stretchy. While you wear this top it would continue to grow. Sent it back, too much like a tshirt that keeps growing.
customer_reviews.author: Discmagic

customer_reviews.title: Pretty purple
customer_reviews.text: I have a lot of hip so I need tops that are loose fitting there. I wasn’t expecting this top to be so loose fitting in chest - and that’s considering I ordered a size down! It’s a beautiful purple and overall I like.
customer_reviews.author: Candyglamour

customer_reviews.title: Comfy
customer_reviews.text: Really cute. It is a bit large, even for a large. But I think it'll shrink up when I wash & dry it. I'm 5'3" 140lb for a better idea. No regrets in my purchase & I cant wait to wear it👍
customer_reviews.author: toni r

customer_reviews.title: Big and boxy, not for small gals
customer_reviews.text: I wear a small... this looked like a big box on me. Wayyyyy to huge! Material was stiff. Even if it did fit it probably wouldn’t hang nicely, does not look like picture
customer_reviews.author: Susan E. Fenton

customer_reviews.title: Not sure really
customer_reviews.text: I honestly don’t remember this sweater but I bet I didn’t like it because of the bad wings. I always try them but never really like them..
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Soft and nice color but runs big.
customer_reviews.text: Easy top to put on and go! Soft material. I ordered a medium and I am 155 and 5’6 and it’s way too big. I will order a small next time. I think it will still Be the baggy style as described but with a little more style to it. I’m still gin guy to wear the medium because it’s comfortable and the color is just a described.
customer_reviews.author: Leah Ferrebee

customer_reviews.title: Awesome shirt, super comfy and light weight
customer_reviews.text: So many compliments on this top! Many ladies at work have asked for the link (which I got from another friend)
customer_reviews.author: mmcdade

customer_reviews.title: Super soft!!!!
customer_reviews.text: So this Shirt is definitely oversized, which I’m a fan of in the cold so I can layer! It’s super soft and warm! Cute with leggings or jeans. You can dress this up or down!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Scott

customer_reviews.title: Super cute, edgy look
customer_reviews.text: I bought the XL in black and it’s fits great and is very comfortable. I paired it with jeans for an edgy yet comfortable look. I’m probably going to buy another in a different color!
customer_reviews.author: Jill D.

customer_reviews.title: Heavy material
customer_reviews.text: Though I like the style and fit, it’s is heavy Cotton and even after washing a couple of times, it’s so rough feeling, I can’t wear it. So NOT soft. It’s going to the donate bin
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not my taste
customer_reviews.text: The only reason I took away a star is because the assymetrical shape is pretty awkward. Returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Elana Flaks

customer_reviews.title: only okay
customer_reviews.text: this products is kind of weird and not as cute in person, it was a different material than I expected
customer_reviews.author: Krystle

customer_reviews.title: Liked It!!!
customer_reviews.text: Good fit but material seems like it will fade fast. I wish it was made in a different material because then I would buy more colors
customer_reviews.author: Mkramire

customer_reviews.title: Fashion forward
customer_reviews.text: The material is nice. I thought it would be more sweater material, but it was closer to thick t shirt material. It’s cut wide. But I love the hankercheif cut
customer_reviews.author: traci

customer_reviews.title: Great for work
customer_reviews.text: I love it. It’s over sized to hide faults but dressy enough to wear for work. Nice with leggings. Very comfortable and the fabric is pretty good quality. Not thin.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. & Mrs. Collins

customer_reviews.title: Great shirt but arms a little tight
customer_reviews.text: Great shirt arms but the arms are a little tight. Loose fit in chest and waist like I wanted
customer_reviews.author: Deena C.

customer_reviews.title: The size chart and size match, I got the right size.
customer_reviews.text: I love the color, the material feels very good. I am not use to wearing shirts like this but it is the new style, it is very comfortable. I like it.
customer_reviews.author: JoAnn Hugill

customer_reviews.title: Eh.
customer_reviews.text: I love the look of the shirt, but the material clings and attracts a lot of lint and hair so it doesn't look very nice when I wear it. It's a bummer.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Lentini

customer_reviews.title: Rough Fabric
customer_reviews.text: Just ok. It's not the nicest fabric but I kept it because I needed more long sleeve tops.
customer_reviews.author: Mateah

customer_reviews.title: Great winter shirt
customer_reviews.text: Great look and texture. Soft and moderately think fabric make it a great winter shirt.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren C.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Returns was very helpful and nice. Shirt was just cut very big.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Wagner
